xp_system.title: üêù XP System Configuration
xp_system.enable_xp_description: Allow users to gain XP from messages and voice chat
xp_system.xp_multiplier_description: Multiply all XP gains by this amount
xp_system.xp_channel_description: Channel where XP can be earned (leave blank for all)
xp_system.level_up_messages_description: Send a message when users level up

moderation.enable_moderation_description: Enable moderation features like warnings and timeouts
moderation.moderation_log_channel_description: Channel where moderation actions are logged
moderation.select_member_action: Please select a member and action.
moderation.action_error: Failed to execute action. Please try again.
moderation.no_members: No members available - Enable GUILD_MEMBERS intent in Discord Developer Portal

welcome.title: üëã Welcome System Configuration
welcome.enable_welcome_description: Send welcome messages to new members
welcome.welcome_channel_description: Channel where welcome messages are sent
welcome.welcome_message_description: Message to send when new members join
welcome.goodbye_message_description: Message to send when members leave
welcome.enable_auto_role_description: Automatically assign roles to new members when they join
welcome.auto_role_select_description: These roles will be automatically given to new members. Bot must have permission to assign these roles.

logs.title: üìã Server Logs Configuration
logs.enable_logs_description: Log server events to designated channels

errors.no_guilds: No servers found. Make sure the bot is added to your servers.
errors.load_error: Failed to load data. Please try again.
errors.save_error: Failed to save settings. Please try again.
errors.permission_error: You don't have permission to configure this server.
errors.network_error: Network error. Please check your connection.

dashboard.subtitle: Manage your server settings
dashboard.select_server_data: Select a server to view data

index.title: Maybee Dashboard
index.subtitle: Professional Discord bot management made easy. Configure your server settings, view analytics, and manage your community with our intuitive web interface.
index.features_subtitle: Powerful features designed to enhance your Discord server
index.feature_xp_description: Engage your community with a comprehensive XP system, leaderboards, and role rewards that keep members active and motivated.
index.feature_moderation_description: Keep your server safe with automated moderation tools, custom filters, and detailed logging for all administrative actions.
index.feature_welcome_description: Create personalized welcome experiences for new members with customizable messages and automated role assignments.
index.feature_analytics_description: Gain insights into your server's activity with detailed statistics, member engagement metrics, and growth tracking.
